item.title: Churn
item.description: Product Tank, 2020 Preso: Churn Reads https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=BOd1W3kJLjI https://www.forentrepreneurs.com/why-churn-is-critical-in-saas/ https://www.intercom.com/blog/designing-user-offboarding/ https://medium.com/mittmedia/we-looked-into-why-our-subscribers-churned-with-machine-learning-d1ac1adf8009 – Product-Led Growth, Chapter 15

item.title: Fear
item.description: Intro To me, fear of publicity correlates with my childhood environment. A small settlement Topar, 70km away from Karaganda, Kazakhstan. Talking or writing about your thoughts in public space is something that I skip subconsciously but I feel why. This is a situation where I have to show up my skills, achievements, my self — you better watch out boy because you don’t want troubles when the drunken father is watching.
